meanings.definition: The inner workings or mechanisms of a system or organization.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the interworkings of a computer helps troubleshoot problems.
meanings.sent2: The interworkings of the company became more efficient after the new software implementation.
meanings.sent3: The interworkings of the clock were so complex that even the repairman was puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The interworkings of the human body are like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: She studied the interworkings of the engine, fascinated by its complexity.

meanings.definition: The interactions or relationships between different components or elements within a system.
meanings.sent1: The interworkings between the departments improved communication.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the interworkings of the ecosystem is crucial for conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: The interworkings of the puzzle pieces created a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The interworkings of the team members were key to the project's success.
meanings.sent5: He observed the interworkings of the ants in the colony, marveling at their teamwork.
